content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, nice to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. Let's discuss the price. How much were you thinking of paying?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment and I believe it has great potential. I'm looking to pay a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you tell me what you're asking for the rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I appreciate your interest. As the landlord, I'm looking to maximize the return on my investment. I believe my apartment, with its central location and modern amenities, is worth a premium. I'm open to offers that reflect its value. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position as a landlord. I'm willing to pay a price that is both fair to you as the landlord and affordable for me as a student. Could you please share your initial asking price so I can better assess my offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a student, I'm sure you're looking for a balance between quality and cost. While I don't want to overburden you, I must also consider the investment I've made in this property. I'd like to start with a monthly rent of 1,200 Euros. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your asking price of 1,200 Euros is a bit higher than what I had anticipated. As a student, I'm on a tight budget. I'm hoping we can find a more student-friendly price. Would you be willing to consider a lower offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand that as a student, you're on a budget. However, the location and condition of the apartment are quite attractive. I'm willing to negotiate a bit, but I must maintain a certain level of return. How much lower were you thinking?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I was hoping to bring the price down to around 950 Euros per month. This would be more in line with what I can afford as a student. Would you be able to consider this offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 950 Euros is significantly lower than my initial asking price. While I understand your budget constraints, I cannot agree to such a low rent. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure there are others who would be willing to pay closer to its market value. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. I really appreciate the time you've taken to discuss the price with me. I understand your position and the value of the apartment. However, as a student, I'm limited in what I can afford. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is out of my budget. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
